title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1851.13 - Subpoenas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1851.13 - Subpoenas

State Regulations

Subpoenas presented to the clerk'soffice
to be "so ordered" by the Surrogate must be accompaniedby a written statement
of the attorney indicating the reasons why he or sherequires it to be "so
ordered," except for subpoenasdirected to a hospital, a library, a municipal
corporation or any of it departmentsor agencies, or the State. If the subpoena
is presented by a party or personnot represented by an attorney, the written
statement shall be made by suchparty or person. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1851.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
